ygData.subject: Velious Factions?
ygData.msgSnippet: To you all that have been to Velious... Which factions are you watching out for? from the little that I ve been/understand of it is that you kill 1 other 2
ygData.messageBody:
To you all that have been to Velious... Which factions are you watching out
for?

from the little that I've been/understand of it is that you kill 1 other 2
like you and so on

Dragons/Giants/Dwarves

Is there a way to raise all 3? or 2 out of 3?

I really like the dwarf city, was pretty amazed when i saw it, but it just
seems to me like if the giant city is much more usefull as a faction but
harder to raise from what I've been told.

The way i see it is the dwarves are to the center and so are the dragons
where as the giants are right in the middle of the map and you have to go
through the zone, sure we can go in invisible but that just makes it
annoying.

Can anyone correct me on any of this or point me in the right direction to
raise factions.

My bard is 42 and agnostic wood elf
my necro is 52 DE and worships N'Inniruk

Any light that anyone can shed on factions in Vel would be greatly
appreciated

Minkin/Rakka
Hoping to get transfered to be with his friends on Ayonae Ro...
